ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Authors are grateful to respective institutions for support. G.D., J.-K.P. and H.-S.S. acknowledges Dongguk University, Republic of Korea for support. This work was supported by the National Research Foundation of Korea (NRF) grant funded by the Korea government (MSIT) (No. 2020R1G1A1004667). S.G. and A.R. acknowledge the project INTERREG—MD.NET: When Brand Meets People and by National Funds through FCT—Foundation for Science and Technology under the Project UIDB/05183/2020. S.G. is funded by national funds through FCT, under the Norma Transitória—DL 57/2016/CP1361/CT0022; M.G.C. wish to thank to “Projeto Estratégico—(UI0204): UIDB/00313/2020 (Portugal)”.
